title: Web-Based Educational Application Management: SCM-Driven Evolution Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic web development knowledge and understanding of software engineering concepts
context.additional_context: Need to acquire systematic management processes for the development and operation of language learning applications

learning_goals: Identify components of web-based language learning applications and design version control systems using SCM tools
Execute procedures to track and back up changes in learning content by applying SCM techniques in simulated environments
Implement workflows to handle application configuration change requests with team members using VR-based collaboration tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
